topics.body:
"Don't know if this is legit":http://www.themetropolist.com/play/latest-play/online-piracy-longer-criminal-offence-uk/
But this would probably the best thing to come in this century. And in *UK*, of all places.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e659606368721677960000#post_53e659606368721677960000
It's real.
Well I don't know about it not being criminal offense, but the part about being given warnings and that's it is true.

I read that if someone is caught pirating, then they will be sent an email saying that what they are doing is illegal.
However I think the reason they are doing this is because Westminister (England-based government) has tried to block every piracy site and blocked porn sites by default as well, the latter can be unblocked at the users request.

...All of it doesn't work though. I can still access the Pirate Bay and if I just check...yep, Pornhub is still here.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57
